data.text:
@CBSDenver Anonymous calls the world out. 

I ask Anonymous how to discern information from disinformation. 

Two short videos with lots of content. 

Please watch:

https://t.co/JsC9unRQVh

https://t.co/l6gS9Asu2b

#Anonymous 
#WeAreAnonymous
#wakeupcallout

#thinklearnaddshare
@CBSDenver Fake stats lead to fake news.

@CBSDenver Letter to Anonymous:

https://t.co/l6gS9Asu2b

Add me, I'm real and need to see clear. 

#Anonymous
.
.
.
.
Maslow will not be proved wrong in the eyes of history the way that will will be if we do not adequately address the crises that face all of our people together.
